storyInfo: The misunderstanding is resolved, but Trilby Asher sets his sights on Leto. SilverAsh learns about this from Degenbrecher and decides to ride along.

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, we have arrived at our terminus—
Lake Silberneherze Station.
Located in the center of a basin, clear and scenic Lake Silberneherze is one of the gems of Kjerag.
Legends say that it is the first tear shed by Kjeragandr. In winter, one can walk on the frozen surface and see into the depths of the lake.
The newly-built statue of Kjeragandr stands on an island in the middle of the lake, watching over Kjerag and her people.
Ladies and gentlemen, we have arrived...
So... it's all a misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: No secrets, no assassinations, no VIP on the train, no nothing?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: If there's any VIP that got me on this train, it was you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Viscount Harold Craigavon, the renowned burdenbeast veterinarian who has become a household name amongst the pastoralists.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm honored.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I beg your pardon, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It was hard not to make certain inferences from the blood on your gloves.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Blood?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Should I explain?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I guess I could tell you, if you really want to know.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I do. Please.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Lily's birthing wasn't easy.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It was premature. She bled a lot, and I had my hands full.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Premature...? She bled?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That's no laughing matter. How is my girl?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I performed first aid, but she needs a professional follow-up.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Leones says he trusts you the most, Craigavon.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's up to you now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll be there in two shakes of a beast's tail!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You look disappointed. Were you expecting something else?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Fine enough by me. I could live up to those expectations.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's no need for that.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: So, what's the misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Ah, well... Lake Silberneherze is a nice place, isn't it?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Particularly on a sunny, clear day like this, when even the air smells particularly fresh...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Do Victorians always talk about the weather when they're trying to change the subject?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I must have heard this a few thousand times by now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Forgive me. We learn from a young age to use Victoria's awful weather as a conversation starter.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Kindly refrain from besmirching the good name of Victoria, My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Why are you guys still standing around chatting?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is our little misunderstanding all cleared up now?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Of course, of course.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Nothing would have happened, if not for some alarmists amongst us.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Whatever, as long as it's all cleared up now.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Running up and down a train was fun, but I've had enough of eating dust under a table.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I went ahead and had a look. A tour guide gave me two maps!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Lake Silberneherze is just down the street from here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Should we go now?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well... dreadfully sorry, Rosalind, but I'm afraid I won't be able to keep my promise.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: There's a lady who needs me at her side, right now.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lily is a burdenbeast, right? Not some Victorian noble codeword?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Perish the thought!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Fine, fine. Go see to your 'Lily'. I can take care of myself here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Wh-What's that look on your face?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're such a kind, thoughtful girl!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Come, let's exchange contact information.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You must find me, should you ever need anything. I am ever at your service.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And I'll keep an eye out for your father... handsome Kjerag fellow, you said?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Thanks for that, dedushka.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright, you guys get back to your chat, I'm gonna get going.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Such a lovely young lady, so strong and cheerful even after losing her mother...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: ...A handsome Kjerag fellow?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Oh, you heard?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Rosalind came to Kjerag to find her long-lost father.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's a touching story. I hope her efforts bear fruit.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Her father...?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Is that what she said?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Well, now that our misunderstanding has been resolved...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Madam Degenbrecher, I'm a huge fan of your work. Could I perhaps beg your autogr—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: No time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm leaving. Take care of Lily.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Wait, Madam Degenbrecher!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Ach—
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: She's gone.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The Black Knight does not seem to take much pride in glories past.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Small wonder, considering the manner in which she was exiled from Kazimierz...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot you were still here.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I didn't want to inadvertently offend the Black Knight.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Glad to know you're so self-aware.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It was my mistake. I should have been more careful with my words.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But do you really believe Madam Degenbrecher's reasoning?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Black Knight has ever been Silverash's loyal lieutenant, from the moment she left Kazimierz and followed him to Kjerag.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: She has been in the mountains lately, training a new unit of troops for Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: We also have reports of unusual goods moving in and out of Kjerag, involving materials of a sensitive nature.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Your point...?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: All conjecture at this time.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But you have your suspicions too, don't you? That's why you kept the young Rosalind's contact.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Looks like your time in Victoria has instilled in you a pathological mistrust of others. What a shame.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: That is my profession, after all.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I will report today's events to the Duke, exactly as they happened.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Wait...!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Allow me to remind you once more, My Lord.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You have a duty you are obligated to carry out. Do not fail Her Grace.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is not a sightseeing trip.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Have you given Karlan Trade's proposal some thought, Mr. Taylor?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I understand Matterhorn has taken you to see our mines and factories. Are you satisfied with what you've seen from Kjerag and Karlan Trade?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I have no complaints about your company, Mr. Silverash.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: But you're a businessman too. I'm sure you understand.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: I would have few reasons to harbor any doubts, if it was Karlan Trade I was dealing with.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: But if I'm to deal with the government of Kjerag, which we know little about... I do feel that more due diligence is in order when it comes to a project of this size.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I saw Victorian soldiers on the streets a few days ago.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: There's no conflict brewing between Kjerag and Victoria... is there?
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: I assure you that no harm will come to you in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Take your time, Mr. Taylor. Kjerag won't disappoint you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Excellent! I look forward to a fruitful partnership, Mr. Silverash.
attributes.name: Columbian Magnate

attributes.content: You will continue to serve as Mr. Taylor's guide tomorrow, Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Attend to any need he has, within reason.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: But... are we really going to work with him?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You don't think he'd be a good partner?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's not my place to judge.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: However, he has found various excuses to put off signing the contract while here in Kjerag, and went back on his word more than once on profit sharing. I fear...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Indeed, he is a shrewd merchant.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjerag has no choice but to work with shrewd merchants at present, while these same shrewd merchants have their pick of options.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: My job is to make Kjerag their only choice.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Go and check on Degenbrecher's recruits.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Have them escort Mr. Taylor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Enciodes?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Look at that, you're using a communicator. I thought you didn't like these long-range methods.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I just don't like to be contacted.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: There's something you should know, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I ran into a girl from Rhodes Island on the train to Lake Silberneherze.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Did you enter into a new partnership with them?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Kjerag snow cheese, burdenbeast accessories, Saintess portraits!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: All Kjerag specialties, get them here!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Burdenbeast blind boxes! Limited edition! While supplies last!
attributes.name: Competing Vendor

attributes.content: It's so lively here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: What are they selling?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Portraits of the Saintess? That's not what Pramanix looks like...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Now, now, girly, the Saintess personally approved this portrait! It's the real deal!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Right, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll have some snow cheese, then. Is that the most popular treat?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I might've had some when I was little.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: You're a local?
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: You could say that.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Should've said so. Don't buy the snow cheese.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: That's for tourists. We don't buy that stuff.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: This shaved cheese is much cheaper and tastes pretty much the same.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Wait, aren't you just ripping off tourists then?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hey, don't put it like that!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Look at the packaging on this snow cheese. See how nice it is? That's what the tourists want. Something nice and classy-looking.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: All I'm doing is making a few francs off the packaging. It's not like I'm selling inferior stuff. The cheese itself is first-rate!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: I guess you have a point.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I'll have the shaved cheese, then. Can I ask you something else, too?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is there a man in Kjerag that everyone agrees is the handsomest?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: The handsomest man, huh?
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Well... I'm a Paleroche, but I'm not gonna lie.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes has got to be the handsomest fellow in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Enciodes... Wait, SilverAsh?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Yeah, the patriarch of Clan Silverash.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: No, no way... it can't be...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: How about another guy? Anybody else?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Er, well... um...
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Never mind, just a random thought. Forget I asked.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: How about something else...? That mountain by the shore of Lake Silberneherze?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Does it have a name or something?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, that's Mount Fugen!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: It's a famous for its romantic atmosphere. Lots of young couples go there.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Young couples...?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: They say any couple that watches the sunrise there will stay together forever. What's that old saying again? 'Kjerag's love is like the unmelting ice.' Humbug, if you ask me.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: But lots of tourists go there. They hang the golden lock of love or something... oh, now that I think of it.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Sir Arctosz likes to go there to hunt, and he's none too happy about all the tourists who get in his way.
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright. Here's the money for the cheese.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Thank you. Come again!
attributes.name: Local Vendor

attributes.content: So this is the Lake Silberneherze that Mamochka always talked about...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: And that's Mount Fugen.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Not a bad view, but Ursus has icy lakes just like it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, the ice goes pretty deep.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Is that the statue of Kjeragandr? Can't see the face.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wow, it's big alright. Wonder how much stone they used to build it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Stone?
Our Kjeragandr statue wouldn't settle for stone!
Huh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Gotta hand it to you: You've got good taste. This is the best spot to admire Kjeragandr's statue.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Er... who might you be?
attributes.name: Leto
Sciurus
attributes.content: I'm—

attributes.name: Sciurus
attributes.content: A-Ahem! That's not important. What's important is what you just said!
Kjeragandr's statue isn't made from any old stone. We used the finest materials to express our love for Her!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The finest, huh?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Like, what?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Like I said, the finest—
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: —Ow!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What? Did you bite your tongue!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's a secret, of course! Can't just go around blabbering to tourists.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I can't tell you the details, but anyway... just know that it's really amazing!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You almost let it slip.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Just almost.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Fine, fine, you didn't say anything.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, enjoy the view. I gotta get going.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh, hey, wait up!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What is it this time?
attributes.name: Leto
Sciurus
attributes.content: You...

attributes.name: Sciurus
attributes.content: Hey, you're a tourist, right?
Kjeragandr's statue's getting officially unveiled right here the day after tomorrow, in the morning.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If you're still in Kjerag, you won't wanna miss it!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Now you're just talking to yourself.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Who knows what's gonna happen in two days? Makes no difference looking at it today.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Of course it makes a difference!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The Saintess is officiating the ceremony herself! You might even get to see Kjeragandr in spirit!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You... say, what's your name?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Rosalind.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Full name.
attributes.name: Sciurus
Leto
attributes.content: Ty nevynosima...

attributes.name: Leto
attributes.content: (Ursine) Rosalind Tatyanovna Larina.
Alright, Rosalind, I'll make this official!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I, Sciurus Browntail, formally invite Rosalind Tatyanovna Larina to attend the unveiling ceremony for Kjeragandr's statue that takes place in two day's time!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Then you'll know that this Kjeragandr is special. There's no other like Her.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You sure are confident.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Well, I guess I'll look forward to it.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Wait, I haven't given you the invitation letter yet!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Why are you in such a hurry, anyway?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus, younger sister of the Browntail Matriarch. Frequently visits other countries on behalf of Kjerag, in recent years.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Did she arrange for Rosalind to be here?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I should find a way to eavesdrop...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Sir, you've been standing in front of my stall holding that newspaper of yours for five minutes.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I need you to buy something, or move out of the way.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Oh, pardon me. One burdenbeast milk tea au lait, please.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Alright, I guess that takes care of that bitch Ratatos's job.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Makes no sense... why do I have to keep an eye on a some kid? Even talk to her, no less?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Gotta say, though, the girl looks slightly familiar...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Rus?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't need my help?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Yucatan!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Leave it to me. I got this.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Let's go. I want Ratatos to tell me what the deal is with that Rosalind girl!
attributes.name: Sciurus
